conversations.user: Finish the Redwood orchestrator smoke tonight; what last metrics do we watch?
conversations.assistant: Track dual-write lag, MCP call latency, and the session export checksum. If all three stay flat for 30 minutes we can ship.

conversations.user: Compliance search lost precision after the vault import; how do we steady the rerank?
conversations.assistant: Apply the memory_strength 0.45 / recency 0.25 / bm25 0.15 weights and log it under Req-08 notes.

conversations.user: Pager is still firing on INC-312 chunker stalls; what immediate mitigations stay on?
conversations.assistant: Keep tokenizer streaming, drop concurrency to 3, and export raw transcripts to compare against INC-204.

conversations.user: Need a fresh trust report for audit; remind me of the non-leak workflow.
conversations.assistant: Run session_log_collector --window 7d, summarize locally, export with tag audit-weekly, wait for approvals before syncing.

conversations.user: Obsidian vault watcher flagged 12 edits; how do we triage without flooding MCP?
conversations.assistant: Batch the edits into a single consolidation session, label them draft, and rerun once per hour until stabilized.

conversations.user: LLM prompt policy changed today; what checklist updates do we apply?
conversations.assistant: Add the safety delta to the CLI preamble, capture the diff in PromptPolicy.md, and regenerate the MCP capability doc.

conversations.user: Need to seed InsightOps demo with blended telemetry; any remembered recipe?
conversations.assistant: Reuse the Hydra blending notebook, cap per-stream rows at 10k, then push vectors via ingest --source hydra.

conversations.user: What's the fastest way to snapshot working memory before tonight's consolidation?
conversations.assistant: Run cli status --snapshot, copy the working-set json into projects.json backup, then pause consolidation cron for 30 minutes.

conversations.user: During October rollout we hit a schema drift; how was it resolved?
conversations.assistant: We added a schema fingerprint to the ingestion metadata and forced re-chunking only when the hash changed.

conversations.user: Remind me of the October rerank A/B; which weight set won?
conversations.assistant: Variant B with vector 0.3 / bm25 0.25 / recency 0.25 / refs 0.1 / strength 0.1 reduced hallucinations by 8%.

conversations.user: What was the workaround for INC-299 memory leaks?
conversations.assistant: We disabled eager chunk caching, restarted the worker pool, and attached the leak trace to the incident doc.

conversations.user: How did we tune InsightOps dashboards for the Q4 pilot?
conversations.assistant: We pre-aggregated the OTEL spans into 15 minute buckets and cached the JSON in the BM25 sidecar.

conversations.user: PhaseSync reviewers asked for more guardrails; what template did we ship?
conversations.assistant: The Phase Gate template includes risk, rollout, rollback, MCP touchpoints, and obsidian links; store it under templates/phase-gate.md.

conversations.user: Need mid-term memory consolidation guidance from October run
conversations.assistant: We grouped by project, selected representatives with strength >0.6, and compressed duplicates into summary notes.

conversations.user: What did the October doctor script flag?
conversations.assistant: It found stale embeddings (older than 45d) and recommended rerunning the embed job with nomic-embed-text 1.3.

conversations.user: Which October bug fix improved CLI stability?
conversations.assistant: We added retries around MCP stdio writes and logged the transcript IDs for replay.

conversations.user: How did we bootstrap the June AppBrain launch?
conversations.assistant: We used the dual-write dry run, BM25 warmup, and the Redwood runbook drafted in Req-01.

conversations.user: Remind me of the long-term retention policy decision
conversations.assistant: We capped long_term memories at 200 per project and rely on quarterly pruning with manual overrides for flagship incidents.

conversations.user: What was the original BugFixer charter?
conversations.assistant: Provide a searchable incident brain with MCP ingestion, BM25 fallback, and weekly reports to SRE.

conversations.user: InsightOps MVP success metrics?
conversations.assistant: Measure time-to-insight under 5m, hit 95% recall for tagged dashboards, and ensure MCP replay under 2s.

conversations.user: Early governance plan for PhaseSync?
conversations.assistant: Three-phase gates: design, build, release; each with MCP confirmation checklists and weekly sign-off.

conversations.user: Legacy LLM integration lessons?
conversations.assistant: Keep prompts under 1k tokens, pre-embed docs, and route anything longer than 500 tokens to the CLI helper.

conversations.user: Original consolidation fallback?
conversations.assistant: If Chroma fails, export memories to JSON, run BM25-only search, and note downtime in Status.md.

conversations.user: What did the first MCP replay harness do?
conversations.assistant: It ran canned JSON-RPC payloads, stored logs under reports/mcp_runs, and compared ranking drift over time.
